# finish(withComposedPixelBuffer:)

**Instance Method**

The method that the custom compositor calls when composition succeeds.

## Declaration

```swift
func finish(withComposedPixelBuffer readOnlyPixelBuffer: CVReadOnlyPixelBuffer)
```

## Finishing the request

- **finish(withComposedVideoFrame:)**: Finishes the request to compose the frame.
- **finish(withComposedTaggedBuffers:)**: The method that the custom compositor calls when composition succeeds.
- **finish(with:)**: Finishes the request with an error.
- **finishCancelledRequest()**: Cancels the request to compose a video frame.
